description.long: Enhances the damage resistance of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Resist.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

Enhances the damage resistance of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Resist.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

description.short: Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
description.long: Reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

description.short: Enhances Resistance, Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
description.long: Enhances the damage resistance of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Resist.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

Enhances the damage resistance of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Resist.Scale}%. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Gives the user a 20% chance for protection from teleportation effects and +3% bonus to defense. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.
